format: html

```{r}
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
tuesdata <- tt_load('2020-02-18')
fc <- tuesdata$food_consumption
```

```{r}
head(fc)
tail(fc)
dim(fc)
str(fc)
```

```{r}
#| fig-height: 11
#| fig-width: 66
ggplot(fc, aes(x = country)) +
  geom_bar()
```

```{r}
#| fig-height: 11
#| fig-width: 22
ggplot(fc, aes(x = food_category)) +
  geom_bar()
```

```{r}
ggplot(fc, aes(x = consumption)) +
  geom_density()
```

```{r}
#| fig-height: 16
#| fig-width: 16
ggplot(fc, aes(x = food_category, y = consumption)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
#| fig-height: 11
#| fig-width: 66
ggplot(fc, aes(x = country, y = consumption)) +
  geom_col()
```

```{r}
#| fig-height: 33
#| fig-width: 11
ggplot(fc, aes(x = consumption, y = country, fill = food_category)) +
  geom_col()
```

```{r}
ggplot(fc, aes(fil = consumption))
```
